begrudge.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to feel angry or upset with someone because they have something that you think they do not deserve
begrudge.translation[0].definitions[0].e: We shouldn’t begrudge her this success.
begrudge.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to feel annoyed or unhappy that you have to pay something, give someone something etc
begrudge.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The farmer’s wife never begrudged him a meal at the end of the day.
I begrudge spending so much money on train fares.
